metadata.title: CVE-2021-20320 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in s390 eBPF JIT in bpf_jit_insn in arch/s390/net/bpf_jit_comp.c in the Linux kernel. In this flaw, a local attacker with special user privilege can circumvent the verifier and may lead to a confidentiality problem.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1028-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

No subscription required
